message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today. I think it would be incredibly valuable for you, and I'm confident it will exceed your expectations. I'm asking for $20,000. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but $20,000 is a bit out of my budget. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $12,000. I think that's a fair price considering the value it would bring to me.

I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While I understand your perspective, the value of this product is significantly higher than your offer.  I'd be willing to come down to $17,000. I believe this price reflects the true value you'll gain from it.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, $17,000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $14,000. I think this is a fair compromise considering the value I'll get from the product.
